main event: A bright, elliptical object was sighted over Los Alamos, New Mexico on 16 July 1950.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 1 minute., The object was approximately 1/2 the size of the full moon., The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes., The object's motion was described as erratic and violently maneuvering., There was no sound, smoke, or vapor emitted from the object.
